quote: Next the trees said to the vine, ‘Come and rule over us.’
And God added: “This is the sign of the covenant that I am making between me and you and every living creature that is with you, for all future generations.

Then the day was coming to a close. The Twelve now came up and said to him: “Send the crowd away, so that they may go into the surrounding villages and countryside to find lodging and provisions, because out here we are in an isolated place.”
